00016 #include "TTEScheduler.h"
00017 
00018 #include <SchedulerMessage_m.h>
00019 #include <SchedulerMessageEvents_m.h>
00020 
00021 namespace TTEthernetModel {
00022 
00023 Define_Module( TTEScheduler);
00024 
00025 simsignal_t TTEScheduler::currentDrift = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00026 simsignal_t TTEScheduler::newCycle = SIMSIGNAL_NULL;
00027 
00028 void TTEScheduler::initialize()
00029 {
00030     currentDrift = registerSignal("currentDrift");
00031     newCycle = registerSignal("newCycle");
00032 
00033     //Start Timer
00034     scheduleAt(simTime(), new SchedulerEvent("NEW_CYCLE", NEW_CYCLE));
00035 
00036     lastCycleStart = simTime();
00037 }
00038 
00039 bool TTEScheduler::registerEvent(SchedulerEvent *event)
00040 {
00041 #ifdef DEBUG
00042     Enter_Method("registerEvent(SchedulerEvent %s)",event->getName());
00043 #else
00044     Enter_Method_Silent();
00045 #endif
00046     take(event);
00047     registredEvents.push_back(event);
00048     if (event->getKind() == ACTION_TIME_EVENT)
00049     {
00050         SchedulerActionTimeEvent *actionTimeEvent = (SchedulerActionTimeEvent*) event;
00051         //Check whether event is in cycle
00052         if(actionTimeEvent->getAction_time()>cycleTicks){
00053             bubble("Schedule contains out of cycle events!");
00054             return false;
00055         }
00056 
00057         if (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() > getTicks())
00058         {
00059             scheduleAt(lastCycleStart + currentTick * actionTimeEvent->getAction_time(),
00060                     actionTimeEvent);
00061         }
00062         else
00063         {
00064             scheduleAt(lastCycleStart
00065                     + currentTick
00066                     * (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() + cycleTicks),
00067                     actionTimeEvent);
00068 
00069         }
00070     }
00071     else if (event->getKind() == TIMER_EVENT)
00072     {
00073         SchedulerTimerEvent *timerEvent = (SchedulerTimerEvent*) event;
00074         scheduleAt(simTime() + currentTick * timerEvent->getTimer(), event);
00075     }
00076     return true;
00077 }
00078 
00079 void TTEScheduler::handleMessage(cMessage *msg)
00080 {
00081     if (msg->isSelfMessage() && (msg->getKind() == ACTION_TIME_EVENT || msg->getKind() == TIMER_EVENT))
00082     {
00083         SchedulerEvent *event = (SchedulerEvent*) msg;
00084         registredEvents.remove(event);
00085         sendDirect(event, event->getDestinationGate());
00086     }
00087     else if (msg->isSelfMessage() && msg->getKind() == NEW_CYCLE)
00088     {
00089         //First the precision is changed for the next cycle
00090         changeDrift();
00091 
00092         emit(newCycle, 1L);
00093         lastCycleStart = simTime();
00094         lastCycleTicks += cycleTicks;
00095         scheduleAt(lastCycleStart + currentTick * cycleTicks, msg);
00096         newCyclemsg = msg;
00097 
00098 
00099         //TODO This must be done in sync module
00100         int modticks = (int)(simTime().dbl()/tick)%cycleTicks;
00101         if(modticks>(cycleTicks/2))
00102             modticks=modticks-cycleTicks;
00103         modticks+=uniform(-0.000000250,0.000000250)/tick;
00104         clockCorrection(-modticks);
00105     }
00106 }
00107 
00108 void TTEScheduler::changeDrift(){
00109 
00110     double newDriftChange = uniform(-maxDriftChange,maxDriftChange);
00111     double newTick = currentTick+newDriftChange;
00112     if((newTick-tick)>maxDrift)
00113         par("current_tick").setDoubleValue(tick+maxDrift);
00114     else if((newTick-tick)<-maxDrift)
00115         par("current_tick").setDoubleValue(tick-maxDrift);
00116     else
00117         par("current_tick").setDoubleValue(newTick);
00118     emit(currentDrift, par("current_tick").doubleValue()-tick);
00119 }
00120 
00121 void TTEScheduler::correctEvents(){
00122     for(std::list<SchedulerEvent*>::const_iterator registredEvent = registredEvents.begin(); registredEvent != registredEvents.end(); registredEvent++){
00123         if((*registredEvent)->getKind() == ACTION_TIME_EVENT){
00124             SchedulerActionTimeEvent *actionTimeEvent = (SchedulerActionTimeEvent*)*registredEvent;
00125             cancelEvent(actionTimeEvent);
00126             //TODO alles m√∂gliche ;)
00127             if (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() > getTicks())
00128             {
00129                 scheduleAt(lastCycleStart + currentTick * actionTimeEvent->getAction_time(),
00130                         actionTimeEvent);
00131             }
00132             else
00133             {
00134                 if(lastCycleStart>simTime()){
00135                     scheduleAt(lastCycleStart
00136                                             + currentTick
00137                                             * (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time()),
00138                                             actionTimeEvent);
00139                 }
00140                 else{
00141                     scheduleAt(lastCycleStart
00142                                             + currentTick
00143                                             * (actionTimeEvent->getAction_time() + cycleTicks),
00144                                             actionTimeEvent);
00145                 }
00146             }
00147         }
00148     }
00149 }
00150 
00151 void TTEScheduler::handleParameterChange(const char* parname){
00152     maxDriftChange = par("max_drift_change").doubleValue();
00153     maxDrift = par("max_drift").doubleValue();
00154     currentTick = par("current_tick").doubleValue();
00155     tick = par("tick").doubleValue();
00156     cycleTicks = par("cycle_ticks").longValue();
00157 }
00158 
00159 void TTEScheduler::clockCorrection(int ticks){
00160     lastCycleStart+=SimTime(ticks*currentTick);
00161 
00162     //Now correct the new cylce time
00163     cancelEvent(newCyclemsg);
00164     scheduleAt(simTime()-(simTime()-lastCycleStart) + currentTick * cycleTicks, newCyclemsg);
00165     //Now correct the events
00166     correctEvents();
00167 }
00168 
00169 unsigned int TTEScheduler::getTicks()
00170 {
00171     if(simTime() >= lastCycleStart){
00172         return round(((simTime() - lastCycleStart) / currentTick).dbl());
00173     }
00174     else{
00175         return cycleTicks - round(((lastCycleStart - simTime()) / currentTick).dbl());
00176     }
00177 }
00178 
00179 unsigned long TTEScheduler::getTotalTicks()
00180 {
00181     return lastCycleTicks + getTicks();
00182 }
